About the Company: Bosch Ltd is Indias largest auto component manufacturer.The company`s activities can be classified under the following divisions Automotive Technology i.e. Diesel and Gasoline Fuel Injection Systems, Blaupunkt Car Multimedia Systems, Auto Electricals and Accessories, Starters and Motors, Energy and Body Systems;Industrial Technology i.e.Packaging Machines, & Special Purpose Machines and Consumer Goods and Building Technology i.e.Power Tools, Security Systems,etc.The company also in the business activities of Automotive Product.
